---
title: "Reading variance.txt files"
author: "Frederick J. Boehm"
date: "4/18/2022"
output: html_document
---

We want to read a collection of variance.txt files for analysis of a single trait. We have a collection of 22 files in results/pheno1/variances_cross1_1000test/. 

```{r}
library(magrittr)
res_list <- list()
for (i in 1:22){
  res_list[[i]] <- readr::read_table(paste0("~/research/ukb-intervals/results/pheno1/variances_cross1_1000test/variance_chr", i, ".txt"), col_names = paste0("chr", i), skip = 2)
}
do.call("cbind", res_list) %>% 
  tibble::as_tibble() %>%
  dplyr::mutate(total_var = rowSums(.)) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(total_sd = sqrt(total_var))
```
